info.name: finan_46_verify_to_create_cash_out_transaction_via_va
info.description:
### Testsuite: Verify to create cash out (withdraw) transaction via va

###### Testcase:

1. Login with owner account
2. Get data
    1. account coa / get list account
    2. account bank / get list bank account
    3. Payment / get list payment => get total
    4. Transaction / Get list transaction => get total transaction
    5. Posting / Get list posting => get total posting
    6. Report / Get report cash_flow => get data
    7. Report / Get report account => get data
    8. Report / Get report account receivable paid => get data
    9. Report / Get report account receivable unpaid => get data
    10. ~~Report / Get report account receivable customer => get data~~
    11. ~~Report / Get report account receivable invoice => get data~~
    12. ~~Home / todo / invoice overdue => get data~~
    13. Home / account balance / account lifetime => get data
    14. Home / cash flow / cash flow period => get data
    15. Home / profit n loss / profit n loss period => get data
    16. ~~Home / receivable account / receivable payable => get data~~
3. ~~Create cash out~~
    1. ~~request cash out~~
    2. ~~confirm cash out~~
4. ~~Check data~~
    1. ~~Payment / get list payment => nothing happen~~
    2. ~~Transaction / Get list transaction => nothing happen~~
    3. ~~Posting / Get list posting => nothing happen~~
5. Hook request from finesys
    1. _**NOTE**_: Update 4Apr2024 - khi hook request sẽ chỉ tạo Payment để lưu lại provider_payment_number
6. Check data
    1. Transaction / Get list transaction ~~\=> increase 1, got data~~ => nothing happen
    2. ~~Transaction / Get transaction detail => data correctly~~
    3. Payment / get list payment => increase 1, got data
    4. Payment / get payment detail => data correctly
    5. account bank / get list bank account => nothing happen
    6. Posting / Get list posting ~~\=> increase records & data correctly~~ => nothing happen
    7. ~~Report / Get report cash_flow =>~~
    8. ~~Report / Get report account =>~~
    9. ~~Report / Get report account receivable paid =>~~
    10. ~~Report / Get report account receivable unpaid =>~~
    11. ~~Home / account balance / account lifetime =>~~
    12. ~~Home / cash flow / cash flow period =>~~
    13. ~~Home / profit n loss / profit n loss period =>~~
7. Hook Success / Failed from finesys
    1. _**NOTE:**_
        1. Success: tạo đầy đủ transaction/posting, update lại status payment
        2. Fail: không tạo transaction/posting, update lại status payment
8. Check data
    
    1. Transaction / Get list transaction => increase 2, got data (có thể handle dạng array, thêm type để support case tạo ra nhiều hơn 2 tnx sau này)
    2. Transaction / Get transaction detail => data correctly
    3. Payment / get list payment => update status, nothing else happen
    4. Payment / get payment detail => data correctly
        
    5. account bank / get list bank account => update data
        
    6. Posting / Get list posting => increase records & data correctly
    7. Report / Get report cash_flow =>
    8. Report / Get report account =>
    9. Report / Get report account receivable paid =>
    10. Report / Get report account receivable unpaid =>
    11. Home / account balance / account lifetime =>
    12. Home / cash flow / cash flow period =>
    13. Home / profit n loss / profit n loss period =>

###### Note:

- Case 3 & 4 tạm thời sẽ không cần handle nữa, chỉ tạo tnx/payment khi nhận hook
- Update 4Apr2024: sẽ không tạo tnx khi request, khi release sẽ tạo 2 transaction
- Hiện tại giữa request và release ko có hold tiền => có thể bị sai lệch và làm âm số dư va account hiển thị trên Finan Book => PO chấp nhận
